item.description: Join us for a one hour Zumba class that will torch calories, leave you drenched with sweat, and will put a smile on your face. Zumba with Jess features current top 40 music mixed with Latin beats to bring out the dancer in you. You'll learn salsa, merengue, cumbia, reggaetone, bachata, cha cha, and Bhangra. Let's get the party started! Walk- ins are welcome $12 Cash or Check NO CREDIT CARDS accepted
